ValidationRule.description: If the Case has a jira it requires Resaons and sub reason
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( Has_JIRA__c = true, NOT(ISBLANK(JIRA_Key__c) ) ), OR( ISPICKVAL(New_Case_Reason__c, ''), ISPICKVAL( Case_Sub_reason__c , '') ), OR( $UserRole.Name = "Technical Support Manager", $UserRole.Name = "Technical Support Rep" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Case Reason and Case Sub Reason are required.
